text: They can't change a caption?

text: Honestly @AIPAC, if you want to remain bipartisan, your speakers list for the policy conference probably should acknowledge which party controls the House. It's @SpeakerPelosi and Minority Leader McCarthy. http://www.policyconference.org/article/PressPhotos.asp …

text: Caps goalie Braden Holtby: Woke. “I’ve got to stay true to my values, and I’m going respectfully decline the offer.” Won’t visit the White House with the Capitals on Monday.

text: For @jamie_weisman

text: The stirring of nationalism, especially racially and ethnically freighted nationalism, has never been good for the Jewish people.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Most Jews in Israel see Trump as a leader who understands their existential threats. Many Jews in the United States see Trump as their existential threat. A divide that can’t be bridged easily.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Jexodus, a “bad Weird Al Yankovic parody” of Bob Marley: How a 23-year-old lingerie model’s mythical concept went from Fox to Trump’s megaphone and into the body politic — and forced Democrats to respond. @SherylNYT
author: jonathanweisman

text: Just what absolutely nobody wanted to see.

text: Hey Las Vegas, join @deborahlipstadt and me April 11 at UNLV for a conversation on the rise of bigotry and anti-Semitism. Prof. Lipstadt will handle the heavy lifting. And thanks @SenatorReid for the invitation.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Amazing thing is, I’m old enough to remember @davidsirota when he was the flak for the House Appropriations Committee. He wasn’t always a bombthrower. He was once a consummate DC Hill rat.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Whelp. “Do you think a white society is superior to a nonwhite society?” Mary Lavelle, 63, asked Steve King, testing his reputation for white supremacist sympathies. “I don’t have an answer for that. That’s so hypothetical,” Mr. King replied.
author: jonathanweisman

text: First he tests @LindseyGrahamSC and his loyalty to his departed best friend. Now he’s testing @KellyannePolls and her loyalty to her husband.
author: jonathanweisman

text: There’s a special circle of hell for Metro riders who sit on the aisle side of an otherwise empty seat, stack their stuff next to them and pretend to be reading as fellow passengers jam in next to them. Disrupt their evil deeds. @unsuckdcmetro
author: jonathanweisman

text: One armed QAnon believer blocked a bridge near the Hoover Dam with an armored truck, while another QAnon believer has been charged with murder after allegedly killing his brother with a sword because he had become convinced his brother was a lizard.

text: Dammit, @IChotiner gets an interview with Bernard-Henri Levy and fails to ask where he gets his shirts. What a waste.

text: My daughter now makes us soap and shampoo to avoid packaging and makes us buy in bulk in paper bags, which we then compost. It’s freaking hard work being green.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Start watching PewDiePie at the 11th minute here and understand how insidious he is, how many thousands and thousands of 14-year-old boys got their first taste of jovial hate from this video. And it's still available.
author: jonathanweisman

text: After Pittsburgh, city’s Jewish community begged President Trump to give a speech denouncing white nationalism. He denounced anti-Semitism but that wasn’t the ask. After Christchurch, he said white nationalism is not on the rise. We’ve gotten used to it.
author: jonathanweisman

text: I actually read the whole manifesto. The shooter was a white nationalist authoritarian environmentalist who feared climate change and urged followers to refuse to pay taxes. Standard "white genocide" stuff but you can't pigeonhole violent evil.
author: jonathanweisman

text: Watching the president of the United States being cheered on in the Oval Office as he vetoes legislation passed by lawmakers in both parties to check what they saw as unconstitutional executive overreach is, well, something.
author: jonathanweisman
